name: algorithms-speed-comparison
description: This project uses the capability to develop Node.js addons using C++, subsequently analyzing the algorithmic execution time in the Node.js runtime environment for both JavaScript and C++.
author: Maksym Derevianchenko

scripts.start: npm run build:addon && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:all && node ./dist/app.js
scripts.build:addon: npm run clear:addon && node-gyp configure build
scripts.clear:all: npm run clear:addon && npm run clear:ts
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:addon && npm run copy:public && npm run copy:temp
